message: Let's make a deal Bob. This offer is in your best interest, considering the inflation.
Alice, let's be reasonable. This offer benefits us both, especially considering the inflation will hurt me more in the next round.
Bob, this is my final offer. Take it, or the inflation will leave you with even less in the next round.
Alice, this is the best offer you'll get.  The inflation is eating away at our potential gains.  Let's be practical and end this.
